title: You think this is funny, Riot?
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/2d2c7637f08bd03842d5322a028b510a.png

Giving me 1IP.

You think you're humorous?

How dare you.

replies.body: You can send in support ticket to remove it I think, if that's poking your OCD or something. Or play a match and stop caring.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F8nw271l,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-19T13:46:48.332+0000)
>
> You can send in support ticket to remove it I think, if that's poking your OCD or something. Or play a match and stop caring.

That's not what OCD is. Lol. Of course, LoL players have no idea how mental disorders work and they assume autism makes people retarded.

OCD tendencies generally differ from person to person, the habits are of a similar nature but they are usually different depending on things like environment. An obsession with order/symmetry/nice numbers etc etc is a pretty common symptom of OCD, but that doesn't mean everyone with OCD shares that symptom.

Not everyone's mental disorders are the same, even if they fall under the same classification. I share chronic depression with many people close to me, but my depression doesn't manifest the same as my Mum's, or my boyfriend's, or my friend's. You take my point anyway.

Besides, he wasn't trying to be rude, just demonstrating his guess as to why something like that might bother you. I don't see why you needed to attack him for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F8nw271l,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-19T11:20:07.444+0000)
>
> That's a lot of RP!

I need it for Xayah, Rakan, and gifting.

I'm sure it'll be enough.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=F8nw271l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-19T10:40:37.145+0000)
>
> At least it's not 1 RP...

I'd be upset! :(
